function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exchange of information in online crisis groups could lead to the spread of misinformation and incorrect advice regarding disease management.","Impact":"Increased risk of implementing ineffective or harmful disease management strategies.","Mitigation":"Provide accurate and verified information through official health channels and platforms. Encourage critical thinking and fact-checking among entrepreneurial networks.","Technologies":"Online platforms for verified health information and communication tools for critical analysis.","People":"Entrepreneurial networks, startup communities, online crisis groups.","Owner":"Health authorities, official health organizations, community leaders."},{"Description":"Communicating intention for startup specific support early may lead to the gathering of large groups of individuals in physical spaces, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks within startup communities.","Mitigation":"Utilize virtual communication and online platforms for early communication and support. Implement strict health and safety measures for in-person gatherings.","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, online support services, health monitoring technology.","People":"Startup founders, employees, support services providers.","Owner":"Startup support organizations, health authorities, event organizers."},{"Description":"Decrease specific barriers for startups may lead to relaxed regulations and oversight, potentially compromising public health and safety standards.","Impact":"Increased risk of unsafe practices and products within startup environments.","Mitigation":"Maintain minimum health and safety standards while reducing administrative barriers. Provide education and support for startups to comply with regulations effectively.","Technologies":"Compliance tracking software, online regulatory resources, remote inspection tools.","People":"Regulatory authorities, startup founders, employees.","Owner":"Government agencies, regulatory bodies, startup support organizations."}]}
